Register Handler

app.handlers.register.handle_register_user(auth)[source]

Handle user registration through console input.

This function prompts the user for a username, an email address, and a password. The collected data is then forwarded to the authentication service’s register_user() method to create a new user.

Parameters:

auth (AuthService) – The authentication service responsible for registering users.

Notes

  • No validation is performed here; all checks occur in AuthService.register_user().

  • Leading and trailing spaces in user input are removed.

  • Passwords are collected as plain text from console input.
